Html:
Are there any plans for continued development and enhancements to this project?  If so, some great features would be (if they don't already exist):

Mail Merge Like Functionality

1) multi-line support (e.g. Address Block)

2) create large mailing documents from a template (e.g. create one document of thousands of pages from a single or multi page template)

 

Thanks and look forward to your response on future plans for this project.

Mike
Regarding Mail Merge, does the existing template feature provide what you're looking for or are you looking for something more complicated than search/replace
